keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commit to reversing the privatisation and supports the promise to reverse the health services of local NHS.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An NHS with time to care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 20,000 more nurses, 8,000 more GPs, and guaranteed GP appointments within 48 hours.
Raise the minimum wage to £8 and introduce 25 hours of free childcare for working parents with kids aged 3 & 4.
Fight for a genuine Living Wage for London and end exploitative zero-hours contracts.
Guarantee a job to every young person out of work for more than a year and to all adults out of work for more than two years.

issues.economy: Real wages down £1,600 since David Cameron became Prime Minister.
issues.health: An NHS with time to care, Reverse the privatisation of NHS.

housing.content: Build 200,000 homes a year by 2020 to help solve the housing crisis.

images.caption: Vicky Foxcroft with a group of children playing with toys.
